item.title: Living on a Prayer
item.description:
The 'Living on a Prayer' comes with one Birds Blue watch face and one Robin's Egg Blue strap. The watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your Modify collection. The strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material and the face is made f..
